name: Connect The Pips
description:
This game was created for the GMTK GameJam 2022

Like Tetris With Dice and A Roll!

How to Play:

  • Left/Right Arrows --> Move the current die left or right
  • Down Arrow --> Move the current die down faster
  • Click on a die to re-roll it
    • You only get one re-roll and the die will lock on that value
  • Connect the dice UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT
    • 2 dice of value 2
    • 3 dice of value 3
    • 4 dice of value 4
    • 5 dice of value 5
    • 6 dice of value 6
    • Surround dice of value 1 to clear all the dice around it
